title: Solving Biofouling Problem of Uranium Extraction from Seawater by Plasma Technology
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00226A, Paper
Xue Zhang, Dadong Shao
The effective extraction of uranium (U(VI)) from seawater is critical for the sound development of nuclear energy in near future. Biofouling is one of the core problems of U(VI) extraction...
